fdd:FDD.titleName: MXF Generic Container with Uncompressed Video Essence UYVY (2vuy)

fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:fullName: MXF Generic Container with Uncompressed Video Essence UYVY (2vuy)

fdd:description.p: MXF file with the Generic Container implementation for uncompressed video, with a picture essence structure identical to that identified by the FOURCC code UYVY. In the SMPTE MXF specification (ST 377-1), the structure is identified using the Apple four-character code 2vuy. This picture data is typically associated with soundtrack essences and, as available, timecode, closed captioning, and other elements.

fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:shortDescription: MXF file with the Generic Container implementation for uncompressed video, with a picture essence structure identical to that identified by the FOURCC code UYVY. In the SMPTE MXF specification (ST 377-1), the structure is identified using the Apple four-character code 2vuy. This picture data is typically associated with soundtrack essences and, as available, timecode, closed captioning, and other elements.
fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:productionPhase: Generally employed in post-production or editing (middle phase) and in limited modes of dissemination (final phase).

fdd:relatedTo.fdd:titleName: MXF Generic Container Mapped to Uncompressed Images

fdd:relationship.fdd:comment: Audio and other essences of various types, not discussed at this time.

fdd:localUse.fdd:preference: None. For preservation reformatting, the Library of Congress' Packard Campus for Audio-Visual Conservation has chosen MXF_OP1a_JP2_LL (lossless JPEG 2000 wrapped in MXF operational pattern 1a).

fdd:sustainabilityFactors.fdd:adoption: Moderate levels of adoption in professional production.
fdd:sustainabilityFactors.fdd:transparency: Relatively transparent; requires tools to write and read.

fdd:values.fdd:note: SMPTE Universal Label (see SMPTE Metadata Registries). The statement of equivalency to Apple four character 2vuy is made in SMPTE standard ST 377-1, annex G.

fdd:citation.fdd:specReference: SMPTE 377-1-2011. Material Exchange Format (MXF) â€” File Format Specification; annex G.

fdd:urlReference.comment: Provides access to registry of SMPTE Universal Labels.
